H0.text: the recipient of first jnanpith award was an author which language. Hindi

H1.text: the recipient of first jnanpith award was an author which language. Bengali

H2.text: the recipient of first jnanpith award was an author which language. Tamil

H3.text: the recipient of first jnanpith award was an author which language. Malayalam

A4.text: The first recipient of the award was the Malayalam writer G. Sankara Kurup who received the award in 1965 for his collection of poems, Odakkuzhal (The Bamboo Flute), published in 1950.

A5.text: G. Sankara Kurup was a poet of Malayalam literature.
